title: Lee Men's Loose Fit Straight Leg Carpenter Jean
description: LOOSE FIT. Designed with a loose fit through the seat and thigh, these carpenter pants sit just below the natural waist. Made with room to move, these work jeans equip for the day ahead.
UTILITY STYLING. This jean features five pockets and an extra side pocket and a hammer loop for improved functionality and convenience.

GET TO WORK. Designed to withstand the grind, this Poly blend jean resists abrasions, wrinkles and stretching. Lightweight and quick-drying, these jeans are strong and durable enough to handle daily wear and tear in the shop, on the ranch or the job site.

A LIFETIME OF QUALITY. For over 100 years, Lee has produced quality apparel with durability and long-lasting construction in mind. Lee is committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely.
SPECIFICATIONS. Zipper fly with button closure, leg opening: 18".
